REWARD_DESCRIPTION1: Maloo has implemented one of the most generous rewards systems in the crypto market.
REWARD_DESCRIPTION2: For every coin purchased through the Maloo exchange we will reward you with 12% per annum of our parent cryptocurrency called ComCoin Until there is none left.
REWARD_DESCRIPTION3: The rewards will be gifted monthly while the coins are held in the secure wallet.
REWARD_DESCRIPTION4: There is a total supply of 100 trillion ComCoins.
REWARD_DESCRIPTION5: On 31 December 2027 the remaining ComCoins not rewarded will be automatically shrunk by 50%.
REWARD_DESCRIPTION6: Starting on the 31 December 2027 every year following ComCoin will continue to burn 50% of the remaining until there is none left.
